cb_uint16 cbBCM_ConnectionParameters::packetType

Length of connection attempt.

Default value 5000ms.

Definition at line 78 of file cb_bt_conn_man.h.

TMasterSlavePolicy cbBCM_ConnectionParameters::masterSlavePolicy

Packet types allowed in the connection.

By default all packets but 3MBit EDR are allowed.

Definition at line 79 of file cb_bt_conn_man.h.

cb_uint16 cbBCM_ConnectionParameters::clockOffset

Whether master slave switch shall be allowed or not.

By default master slave switch is allowed.

Definition at line 80 of file cb_bt_conn_man.h.

cb_uint16 cbBCM_ConnectionParameters::linkSupervisionTimeout

Clock offset is part in inquiry response.

Using this value may result in faster connection setup Default value 0.
